item_category: iPhone 12 mini packs big features in a 5.4-inch design. Incredible low-light photography with Night mode on all cameras. Cinema-grade Dolby Vision HDR video recording, editing and playback. Powerful A14 Bionic chip. 5G capable and new MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging. It's big news for mini.
review_title: It was great! Is a good experience.
review_text: Amazing purchase!! I am proud of my choose!! I am enjoying this iPhone.

Most new phones do the same thing and same functions depends what you use them for - however the better camera and faster processor worth the money long term investment as it is 5g ready as well make sure you go for the bigger memory option.
Great communication from Argos and quick to dispatch. Excellent phone thank you
Great phone and the price is reasonable compared to other iPhones. And it looks bigger than expected.
